en: Gone from me is my authority."
[Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
[Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
[Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
Then into a chain whose length
whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah,

ar: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
en: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great

ar: إِنَّهُ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
en: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great
